main event: A light or flash appeared to burst into the ground near Hensley, Arkansas on October 31, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes., The object's appearance was described as a flash of light that burst into flames upon impact., The sighting was made from an automobile., The observer speculated that it might have been caused by a meteorite., The report does not contain any photographs or additional visual evidence.
sighted object: light or flash that burst into the ground
witness description: The sighting was observed from an automobile without further specifics provided.
